title: YAM Vx Proposal
body:
Just two proposes

1、When rebase additional issue，the holder have less yam token ，more percent of additional issue he have.

2、When rebase deflation，the holder have more yam token ，less percent of deflation he have.

Initiator : 33357

//

两条建议：

1、当YAM通过rebase增发时，持有YAM越少的人增发的比例越高。

2、当YAM通过rebase通缩时，持有YAM越多的人通缩的比例越少。

发起者：33357
author: 0x1f2479ee1b4aFE789e19D257D2D50810ac90fa59
